# Orthanc
[![part of Typo ecosystem](https://img.shields.io/badge/Typo%20ecosystem-Orthanc-blue?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/topics/skribbl-typo)

Former main typo API, now replaced by Ithil-Rebirth and now used for the OAuth2 login flow.  

## About
The legacy-deprecated branch contains all past API functions for the skribbltypo-client usage, which are deprecated since at least Dec. '20.  
The main branch is reduced to all still used functions and the Palantir profile picture contest website from spring '21.  

Orthanc is mainly used to get Palantir user access tokens via Discord's OAuth2 API to access the Palantir member/guild api (also in this repo) or log on on Ithil-Rebirth.  
It also features a emoji-scraper API which is used for skribbltypos custom emojis.
